display.name: Audit Events by Users
display.description: List of Audit Events by Users

query.sql: SELECT dbusername, count(*) EVENTS FROM unified_audit_trail GROUP BY dbusername ORDER BY events DESC
SELECT nvl(unified_audit_policies,'n/a'), count(*) EVENTS FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE dbusername =:DBUSERNAME GROUP BY unified_audit_policies ORDER BY events DESC
SELECT action_name, count(*) EVENTS FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE dbusername =:DBUSERNAME GROUP BY action_name ORDER BY events DESC
SELECT userhost, os_username, count(*) EVENTS FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE dbusername =:DBUSERNAME GROUP BY userhost, os_username ORDER BY events DESC

SELECT dbusername,unified_audit_policies,action_name, count(*) EVENTS FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE dbusername =:DBUSERNAME GROUP BY dbusername,unified_audit_policies,action_name ORDER BY unified_audit_policies, events DESC
SELECT NULL "Events", -- group dbusername, -- series COUNT(*) -- value FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE :days IS NULL OR event_timestamp>=sysdate-:days GROUP BY dbusername ORDER BY dbusername

display.name: Audit Policy
display.description: Audit events for User by Audit Policy

CustomValues.TITLE_TEXT: Audit Events for user by Audit Policy
CustomValues.TITLE: true

query.sql: SELECT --NULL "Events", -- group dbusername, nvl(unified_audit_policies,'n/a'), -- series count(*) EVENTS -- value FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE dbusername =:DBUSERNAME GROUP BY dbusername,unified_audit_policies ORDER BY events DESC

display.name: Action
display.description: Audit Events for User by Action

CustomValues.TITLE_TEXT: Audit Events for User by Action
CustomValues.TITLE: true

query.sql: SELECT --NULL "Events", -- group dbusername, action_name, -- series count(*) EVENTS -- value FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE dbusername =:DBUSERNAME GROUP BY dbusername,action_name ORDER BY events DESC

display.name: User Host
display.description: Audit Events for User by User Host

query.sql: SELECT dbusername, userhost, -- group os_username, -- series count(*) EVENTS -- value FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE dbusername =:DBUSERNAME GROUP BY dbusername, userhost,os_username ORDER BY events DESC

display.name: Audit Policy and Actions
display.description: Audit Events for User by Audit Policy

query.sql: SELECT dbusername,unified_audit_policies,action_name, count(*) EVENTS FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE dbusername =:DBUSERNAME GROUP BY dbusername,unified_audit_policies,action_name ORDER BY unified_audit_policies, events DESC

display.name: Audit Events by Day
display.description: List number of Audit Events by days

query.sql: SELECT NULL "Events", -- group to_char(TRUNC(event_timestamp),'DD.MM.YYYY') "Day", -- series COUNT(*) "Amount" -- value FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE :days IS NULL OR event_timestamp>=sysdate-:days GROUP BY TRUNC(event_timestamp) ORDER BY TRUNC(event_timestamp)

display.name: History
display.description: Audit events for User by Audit Policy

query.sql: SELECT to_char(min(event_timestamp_utc),'DD.MM.YYYY HH24:MI:SS') "Oldest", to_char(max(event_timestamp_utc),'DD.MM.YYYY HH24:MI:SS') "Newest", count(*) "Total" FROM unified_audit_trail

display.name: by hour
display.description: Audit Events for User by Action

query.sql: WITH hour_windows ( time ) AS ( SELECT TO_DATE(:Day || to_char(n - 1,'09'), 'DD:MM.YYYY HH24') hr FROM ( SELECT level n FROM dual CONNECT BY level <= 24 ) WHERE :Day IS NOT NULL ) SELECT NULL "Events", -- group to_char(trunc(TIME, 'HH24'), 'HH24:MI') "Hours", -- series coalesce(COUNT(event_timestamp), 0) "Amount" -- value FROM hour_windows t LEFT OUTER JOIN unified_audit_trail u ON ( TIME = trunc(u.event_timestamp, 'HH24') AND trunc(u.event_timestamp) = :Day ) GROUP BY to_char(trunc(TIME, 'HH24'), 'HH24:MI') ORDER BY to_char(trunc(TIME, 'HH24'), 'HH24:MI')

display.name: DB Info
display.description: Audit Events by DB ID

query.sql: SELECT d.name "DB Name", u.dbid "DB ID", i.instance_name "Instance Name", u.instance_id "Instance Number", COUNT(u.event_timestamp) "Events" FROM unified_audit_trail u, gv$instance i, v$database d WHERE u.dbid = con_id_to_dbid(sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_ID')) AND u.instance_id = i.instance_number GROUP BY u.dbid, d.name, i.instance_name, u.instance_id

display.name: Sessions by Audit Type Datapump
display.description: List information about sessions for audit type Datapump based on UNIFIED_AUDIT_TRAIL

query.sql: SELECT max(u.event_timestamp) "START_TIMESTAMP", u.dbusername, u.sessionid, u.proxy_sessionid, u.audit_type, u.sessionid, u.os_username, u.userhost, u.instance_id, COUNT(u.entry_id) "RECORDS" FROM unified_audit_trail u WHERE u.dbid = con_id_to_dbid(sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_ID')) AND audit_type = 'Datapump' AND (:days IS NULL OR event_timestamp>=sysdate-:days) AND (:dbuser IS NULL OR dbusername = upper(:dbuser)) GROUP BY u.dbusername, u.sessionid, u.proxy_sessionid, u.audit_type, u.os_username, u.userhost, u.instance_id ORDER BY "START_TIMESTAMP" DESC

display.name: Details
display.description: Available details for a particular datapump session

query.sql: SELECT event_timestamp, dbusername, entry_id, statement_id, action_name, return_code, dp_text_parameters1, dp_boolean_parameters1, audit_type, unified_audit_policies, sql_text FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE sessionid = :SESSIONID OR sessionid = :PROXY_SESSIONID ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC, entry_id ASC

display.name: Sessions by Audit Type RMAN_AUDIT
display.description: List information about sessions for audit type RMAN_AUDIT based on UNIFIED_AUDIT_TRAIL

query.sql: SELECT max(u.event_timestamp) "START_TIMESTAMP", u.dbusername, u.sessionid, u.proxy_sessionid, u.audit_type, u.os_username, u.userhost, u.instance_id, COUNT(u.entry_id) "RECORDS" FROM unified_audit_trail u WHERE u.dbid = con_id_to_dbid(sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_ID')) AND audit_type = 'RMAN_AUDIT' AND (:days IS NULL OR event_timestamp>=sysdate-:days) AND (:dbuser IS NULL OR dbusername = upper(:dbuser)) GROUP BY u.dbusername, u.sessionid, u.proxy_sessionid, u.audit_type, u.os_username, u.userhost, u.instance_id ORDER BY "START_TIMESTAMP" DESC

display.name: Details
display.description: Available details for a particular RMAN session

query.sql: SELECT event_timestamp, dbusername, entry_id, statement_id, action_name, return_code, rman_session_recid, rman_session_stamp, rman_operation, rman_object_type, rman_device_type, audit_type, unified_audit_policies, sql_text FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE sessionid = :SESSIONID OR sessionid = :PROXY_SESSIONID ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC, entry_id ASC

display.name: Sessions by Audit Type Database Vault
display.description: List information about sessions for audit type Database Vault based on UNIFIED_AUDIT_TRAIL
display.tooltip: Sessions by Audit Type Database Vault

query.sql: SELECT max(u.event_timestamp) "START_TIMESTAMP", u.dbusername, u.sessionid, u.proxy_sessionid, u.audit_type, u.os_username, u.userhost, u.instance_id, COUNT(u.entry_id) "RECORDS" FROM unified_audit_trail u WHERE u.dbid = con_id_to_dbid(sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_ID')) AND audit_type = 'Database Vault' AND (:days IS NULL OR event_timestamp>=sysdate-:days) AND (:dbuser IS NULL OR dbusername = upper(:dbuser)) GROUP BY u.dbusername, u.sessionid, u.proxy_sessionid, u.audit_type, u.os_username, u.userhost, u.instance_id ORDER BY "START_TIMESTAMP" DESC

display.name: Details
display.description: Available details for a particular Database Vault session

query.sql: SELECT event_timestamp, dbusername, entry_id, statement_id, action_name, return_code, dv_action_code, dv_action_name, dv_extended_action_code, dv_grantee, dv_return_code, dv_action_object_name, dv_rule_set_name, dv_comment, dv_factor_context, dv_object_status, audit_type, unified_audit_policies, sql_text FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE sessionid = :SESSIONID OR sessionid = :PROXY_SESSIONID ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC, entry_id ASC

display.name: Sessions by any Audit Type
display.description: List information about sessions any audit type based on UNIFIED_AUDIT_TRAIL

query.sql: SELECT max(u.event_timestamp) "START_TIMESTAMP", u.dbusername, u.sessionid, u.proxy_sessionid, u.audit_type, u.os_username, u.userhost, u.instance_id, COUNT(u.entry_id) "RECORDS" FROM unified_audit_trail u WHERE u.dbid = con_id_to_dbid(sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_ID')) AND (:days IS NULL OR event_timestamp>=sysdate-:days) AND (:dbuser IS NULL OR dbusername = upper(:dbuser)) GROUP BY u.dbusername, u.sessionid, u.proxy_sessionid, u.audit_type, u.os_username, u.userhost, u.instance_id ORDER BY "START_TIMESTAMP" DESC

display.name: Details
display.description: Available details for a particular session

query.sql: SELECT event_timestamp, dbusername, entry_id, statement_id, action_name, return_code, object_schema, object_name, audit_type, unified_audit_policies, sql_text, system_privilege_used, current_user FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE sessionid = :SESSIONID OR sessionid = :PROXY_SESSIONID ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC, entry_id ASC

display.description: List information about sessions for audit type Fine Grained Audit based on UNIFIED_AUDIT_TRAIL

display.name: Details
display.description: Available details for a particular Fine Grained Audit session

query.sql: SELECT event_timestamp, dbusername, entry_id, statement_id, action_name, return_code, fga_policy_name, audit_type, unified_audit_policies, sql_text FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE sessionid = :SESSIONID OR sessionid = :PROXY_SESSIONID ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC, entry_id ASC

display.name: Session by Audit Type Standard
display.description: List information about sessions for audit type Standard based on UNIFIED_AUDIT_TRAIL

query.sql: SELECT max(u.event_timestamp) "START_TIMESTAMP", u.dbusername, u.sessionid, u.proxy_sessionid, u.audit_type, u.os_username, u.userhost, u.instance_id, COUNT(u.entry_id) "RECORDS" FROM unified_audit_trail u WHERE u.dbid = con_id_to_dbid(sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_ID')) AND audit_type = 'Standard' AND (:days IS NULL OR event_timestamp>=sysdate-:days) AND (:dbuser IS NULL OR dbusername = upper(:dbuser)) GROUP BY u.dbusername, u.sessionid, u.proxy_sessionid, u.audit_type, u.os_username, u.userhost, u.instance_id ORDER BY "START_TIMESTAMP" DESC

display.name: Details
display.description: Available details for a particular session

query.sql: SELECT event_timestamp, dbusername, entry_id, statement_id, action_name, return_code, object_schema, object_name, audit_type, unified_audit_policies, sql_text, system_privilege_used, current_user FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE sessionid = :SESSIONID OR sessionid = :PROXY_SESSIONID ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC, entry_id ASC

display.name: Proxy Sessions
display.description: List information about proxy sessions for audit type Standard based on UNIFIED_AUDIT_TRAIL

query.sql: SELECT max(u.event_timestamp) "START_TIMESTAMP", u.dbusername, u.sessionid, u.proxy_sessionid, u.audit_type, u.os_username, u.userhost, u.instance_id, COUNT(u.entry_id) "RECORDS" FROM unified_audit_trail u WHERE u.dbid = con_id_to_dbid(sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_ID')) AND audit_type = 'Standard' AND u.proxy_sessionid <> 0 AND (:days IS NULL OR event_timestamp>=sysdate-:days) AND (:dbuser IS NULL OR dbusername = upper(:dbuser)) GROUP BY u.dbusername, u.sessionid, u.proxy_sessionid, u.audit_type, u.os_username, u.userhost, u.instance_id ORDER BY "START_TIMESTAMP" DESC

display.name: Details
display.description: Available details for a particular session

query.sql: SELECT event_timestamp, dbusername, entry_id, statement_id, action_name, return_code, object_schema, object_name, audit_type, unified_audit_policies, sql_text, system_privilege_used, current_user FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE sessionid = :SESSIONID OR sessionid = :PROXY_SESSIONID ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC, entry_id ASC

display.description: List detail of a particular session

query.sql: SELECT event_timestamp, dbusername, entry_id, statement_id, action_name, return_code, object_schema, object_name, unified_audit_policies, sql_text FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE sessionid = :SESSIONID OR sessionid = :PROXY_SESSIONID ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC, entry_id ASC

display.name: Session Overview
display.description: Overview of standard audit session

query.sql: SELECT max(u.event_timestamp) "START_TIMESTAMP", u.dbusername, u.sessionid, u.proxy_sessionid, u.os_username, u.userhost, u.terminal, u.client_program_name, u.instance_id, COUNT(u.entry_id) "Audit Entries" FROM unified_audit_trail u WHERE u.dbid = con_id_to_dbid(sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_ID')) AND audit_type = 'Standard' AND (:days IS NULL OR event_timestamp>=sysdate-:days) AND (:dbuser IS NULL OR dbusername = upper(:dbuser)) GROUP BY u.dbusername, u.sessionid, u.proxy_sessionid, u.os_username, u.userhost, u.terminal, u.client_program_name, u.instance_id ORDER BY "START_TIMESTAMP" DESC

SELECT event_timestamp, dbusername, entry_id, statement_id, action_name, return_code, object_schema, object_name, unified_audit_policies, sql_text FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE sessionid = :SESSIONID OR sessionid = :PROXY_SESSIONID ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC, entry_id ASC

display.name: Sessions by Audit Type Protocol
display.description: List information about sessions for audit type Protocol based on UNIFIED_AUDIT_TRAIL

query.sql: SELECT max(u.event_timestamp) "START_TIMESTAMP", u.dbusername, u.sessionid, u.proxy_sessionid, u.audit_type, u.sessionid, u.os_username, u.userhost, u.instance_id, COUNT(u.entry_id) "RECORDS" FROM unified_audit_trail u WHERE u.dbid = con_id_to_dbid(sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_ID')) AND audit_type = 'Protocol' AND (:days IS NULL OR event_timestamp>=sysdate-:days) AND (:dbuser IS NULL OR dbusername = upper(:dbuser)) GROUP BY u.dbusername, u.sessionid, u.proxy_sessionid, u.audit_type, u.sessionid, u.os_username, u.userhost, u.instance_id ORDER BY "START_TIMESTAMP" DESC

display.name: Details
display.description: Available details for a particular session

query.sql: SELECT event_timestamp, dbusername, entry_id, statement_id, action_name, return_code, object_schema, object_name, audit_type, protocol_session_id, protocol_return_code, protocol_action_name, protocol_userhost, protocol_message, unified_audit_policies, sql_text, system_privilege_used, current_user FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE sessionid = :SESSIONID OR sessionid = :PROXY_SESSIONID ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC, entry_id ASC

display.name: Sessions by Audit Type Direct path API
display.description: List information about sessions for audit type Direct path API based on UNIFIED_AUDIT_TRAIL
display.tooltip: Sessions by Audit Type Direct path API

query.sql: SELECT max(u.event_timestamp) "START_TIMESTAMP", u.dbusername, u.sessionid, u.proxy_sessionid, u.audit_type, u.sessionid, u.os_username, u.userhost, u.instance_id, COUNT(u.entry_id) "RECORDS" FROM unified_audit_trail u WHERE u.dbid = con_id_to_dbid(sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_ID')) AND audit_type = 'Direct path API' AND (:days IS NULL OR event_timestamp>=sysdate-:days) AND (:dbuser IS NULL OR dbusername = upper(:dbuser)) GROUP BY u.dbusername, u.sessionid, u.proxy_sessionid, u.audit_type, u.os_username, u.userhost, u.instance_id ORDER BY "START_TIMESTAMP" DESC

display.name: Details
display.description: Available details for a particular session

query.sql: SELECT event_timestamp, dbusername, entry_id, statement_id, action_name, return_code, object_schema, object_name, audit_type, direct_path_num_columns_loaded, unified_audit_policies, sql_text, system_privilege_used, current_user FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE sessionid = :SESSIONID OR sessionid = :PROXY_SESSIONID ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC, entry_id ASC

folder.name: Top Audit Events
folder.description: Provide information about audit events, selected and organized according to various criteria. This information can help you identify audit events that occur more frequently than expected or generate more data than expected.

display.name: Top Audit Events by Client
display.description: Top Audit Events by Client

query.sql: SELECT "USERHOST", "EVENTS" FROM ( SELECT nvl(userhost, 'n/a') userhost, COUNT(*) events FROM unified_audit_trail GROUP BY userhost ORDER BY events DESC )

display.name: Top Audit Events by User
display.description: Top Audit Events by User

query.sql: SELECT "DBUSERNAME", "EVENTS" FROM ( SELECT nvl(dbusername, 'n/a') dbusername, COUNT(*) events FROM unified_audit_trail GROUP BY dbusername ORDER BY events DESC )

display.name: Top Audit Events by Policy
display.description: Top Audit Events by Unified Audit Policy

query.sql: SELECT "UNIFIED_AUDIT_POLICIES", "EVENTS" FROM ( SELECT nvl(unified_audit_policies, 'n/a') unified_audit_policies, COUNT(*) events FROM unified_audit_trail GROUP BY unified_audit_policies ORDER BY events DESC )

display.name: Top Audit Events by Audit Type
display.description: Top Audit Events by Audit Type
display.tooltip: Top Audit Events by Audit Type

query.sql: SELECT "AUDIT_TYPE", "EVENTS" FROM ( SELECT nvl(audit_type, 'n/a') audit_type, COUNT(*) events FROM unified_audit_trail GROUP BY audit_type ORDER BY events DESC )

display.name: Top Audit Events by DBID
display.description: Top Audit Events by Database ID

query.sql: SELECT "DBID", "EVENTS" FROM ( SELECT nvl(dbid, 0) dbid, COUNT(*) events FROM unified_audit_trail GROUP BY dbid ORDER BY events DESC )

display.name: Top Audit Events by OS User
display.description: Top Audit Events by OS User
display.tooltip: Top Audit Events by OS User

query.sql: SELECT "OS_USERNAME", "EVENTS" FROM ( SELECT nvl(os_username, 'n/a') os_username, COUNT(*) events FROM unified_audit_trail GROUP BY os_username ORDER BY events DESC )

display.name: Top Audit Events by Client Program
display.description: Top Audit Events by Client Program name
display.tooltip: Top Audit Events by Client Program

query.sql: SELECT "CLIENT_PROGRAM_NAME", "EVENTS" FROM ( SELECT nvl(client_program_name, 'n/a') client_program_name, COUNT(*) events FROM unified_audit_trail GROUP BY client_program_name ORDER BY events DESC )

display.name: Top Audit Events by Action
display.description: Top Audit Events by Action Name

query.sql: SELECT "ACTION_NAME", "EVENTS" FROM ( SELECT nvl(action_name, 'n/a') action_name, COUNT(*) events FROM unified_audit_trail GROUP BY action_name ORDER BY events DESC )

display.name: Top Audit Events by SQL Text
display.description: Top Audit Events by SQL Text
display.tooltip: Top Audit Events by SQL Text

query.sql: SELECT "EVENTS", "SQL_TEXT" FROM ( SELECT sql_text, COUNT(*) events FROM ( SELECT event_timestamp, to_char(dbms_lob.substr(sql_text, 4000)) sql_text FROM unified_audit_trail ) GROUP BY sql_text ORDER BY events DESC )

display.name: Top Audit Events by Object Schema
display.description: Top Audit Events by Object Schema
display.tooltip: Top Audit Events by Object Schema

query.sql: SELECT "OBJECT_SCHEMA", "EVENTS" FROM ( SELECT nvl(object_schema, 'n/a') object_schema, COUNT(*) events FROM unified_audit_trail GROUP BY object_schema ORDER BY events DESC )

display.name: Top Audit Events by Object Name
display.description: Top Audit Events by Object Name
display.tooltip: Top Audit Events by Object Name

query.sql: SELECT "OBJECT_NAME", "EVENTS" FROM ( SELECT nvl(object_name, 'n/a') object_name, COUNT(*) events FROM unified_audit_trail GROUP BY object_name ORDER BY events DESC )

display.name: Top Audit Events by Application Context
display.description: Top Audit Events by Application Context
display.tooltip: Top Audit Events by Application Context

query.sql: SELECT "APPLICATION_CONTEXTS", "EVENTS" FROM ( SELECT nvl(application_contexts, 'n/a') application_contexts, COUNT(*) events FROM unified_audit_trail GROUP BY application_contexts ORDER BY events DESC )

display.name: Top Audit Events by External User ID
display.description: Top Audit Events by External User ID
display.tooltip: Top Audit Events by External User ID

query.sql: SELECT "EXTERNAL_USERID", "EVENTS" FROM ( SELECT nvl(external_userid, 'n/a') external_userid, COUNT(*) events FROM unified_audit_trail GROUP BY external_userid ORDER BY events DESC )

display.name: Top Audit Events by Global User ID
display.description: Top Audit Events by Global User ID
display.tooltip: Top Audit Events by Global User ID

query.sql: SELECT "GLOBAL_USERID", "EVENTS" FROM ( SELECT nvl(global_userid, 'n/a') global_userid, COUNT(*) events FROM unified_audit_trail GROUP BY global_userid ORDER BY events DESC )

display.name: Disable all Audit Policy
display.description: Generate statements to disable all audit policies as they are currently set in AUDIT_UNIFIED_ENABLED_POLICIES

query.sql: SELECT "'NOAUDITPOLICY'||POLICY_NAME||';'||CHR(10)" FROM( SELECT 'NOAUDIT POLICY ' || policy_name || ';' || CHR(10) FROM audit_unified_enabled_policies WHERE entity_name = 'ALL USERS' AND entity_type = 'USER' UNION ALL SELECT 'NOAUDIT POLICY ' || policy_name || ' BY USERS WITH GRANTED ROLES ' || entity_name || ';' || CHR(10) FROM audit_unified_enabled_policies WHERE entity_type = 'ROLE' UNION ALL SELECT 'NOAUDIT POLICY ' || policy_name || ' BY ' || entity_name || ';' || CHR(10) FROM audit_unified_enabled_policies WHERE entity_name <> 'ALL USERS' AND entity_type = 'USER' )

display.name: Enable all Audit Policy
display.description: Generate statements to enable all audit policies as they are currently set in AUDIT_UNIFIED_ENABLED_POLICIES.

query.sql: SELECT "'AUDITPOLICY'||POLICY_NAME||';'||CHR(10)" FROM( SELECT 'AUDIT POLICY ' || policy_name || ';' || CHR(10) FROM audit_unified_enabled_policies WHERE entity_name = 'ALL USERS' AND entity_type = 'USER' UNION ALL SELECT 'AUDIT POLICY ' || policy_name || ' BY USERS WITH GRANTED ROLES ' || entity_name || ';' || CHR(10) FROM audit_unified_enabled_policies WHERE entity_type = 'ROLE' UNION ALL SELECT 'AUDIT POLICY ' || policy_name || ' BY ' || entity_name || ';' || CHR(10) FROM audit_unified_enabled_policies WHERE entity_name <> 'ALL USERS' AND entity_type = 'USER' )

display.name: Drop all Audit Policy
display.description: Generate statements to drop all audit policies as they are currently set in AUDIT_UNIFIED_ENABLED_POLICIES.

query.sql: SELECT 'DROP AUDIT POLICY ' || policy_name || ';' || CHR(10) FROM audit_unified_policies WHERE oracle_supplied = 'NO' GROUP BY policy_name

display.name: Create all Audit Policy
display.description: Generate statements to create all audit policies as they are currently set in AUDIT_UNIFIED_ENABLED_POLICIES.

query.sql: SELECT '-- Create statement for audit policy ' || policy_name || CHR(10) || TRIM(TRAILING CHR(10) FROM TRIM(TRIM(CHR(10) FROM command))) || ';' || CHR(10) || CHR(10) AS code FROM ( SELECT dbms_metadata.get_ddl('AUDIT_POLICY', policy_name) AS command, policy_name FROM audit_unified_policies WHERE oracle_supplied = 'NO' GROUP BY policy_name UNION ALL SELECT to_clob('COMMENT ON ' || policy_name || ' IS ' || comments) AS command, policy_name FROM audit_unified_policy_comments )

display.name: Clean Up Events
display.description: Displays the audit cleanup event history.

display.name: Clean Up Jobs
display.description: Displays the currently configured audit trail purge jobs

display.name: Configuration
display.description: List current audit configuration parameter

display.name: Last Archive Timestamp
display.description: Displays the last archive timestamps set for the audit trails

query.sql: SELECT "AUDIT_TRAIL", "RAC_INSTANCE", "LAST_ARCHIVE_TS", "DATABASE_ID", "CONTAINER_GUID" FROM( select * from dba_audit_mgmt_last_arch_ts )

display.name: Unified Audit Policies
display.description: Display overview about unified audit policies based on the views AUDIT_UNIFIED_POLICIES and AUDIT_UNIFIED_ENABLED_POLICIES.

query.sql: SELECT "POLICY_NAME", "ACTIVE", "AUDIT_CONDITION", "CONDITION_EVAL_OPT", "COMMON", "INHERITED", "AUDIT_ONLY_TOPLEVEL", "ORACLE_SUPPLIED" FROM( SELECT u.policy_name, nvl(( SELECT 'YES' FROM audit_unified_enabled_policies a WHERE a.policy_name = u.policy_name GROUP BY a.policy_name ), 'NO') active, u.audit_condition, u.condition_eval_opt, u.common, u.inherited, u.audit_only_toplevel, u.oracle_supplied FROM audit_unified_policies u GROUP BY u.policy_name, u.audit_condition, u.condition_eval_opt, u.common, u.inherited, u.audit_only_toplevel, u.oracle_supplied ORDER BY u.policy_name )

display.name: Comment
display.description: Display the description for a specific Unified Audit Policy if it is available in AUDIT_UNIFIED_POLICY_COMMENTS.

query.sql: SELECT nvl(min(comments), 'Not defined') "Comment" FROM audit_unified_policy_comments WHERE policy_name=:POLICY_NAME

display.name: Actions
display.description: Display details about a specific unified audit policy based on view AUDIT_UNIFIED_POLICIES.

query.sql: SELECT * FROM audit_unified_policies WHERE policy_name=:POLICY_NAME

display.name: NOAUDIT Statement
display.description: Create the NOAUDIT POLICY statements for this unified audit policy as it is defined in AUDIT_UNIFIED_ENABLED_POLICIES

query.sql: SELECT 'NOAUDIT POLICY ' || policy_name || ';' || CHR(10) FROM audit_unified_enabled_policies WHERE policy_name = :POLICY_NAME AND entity_name = 'ALL USERS' AND entity_type = 'USER' UNION ALL SELECT 'NOAUDIT POLICY ' || policy_name || ' BY USERS WITH GRANTED ROLES ' || entity_name || ';' || CHR(10) FROM audit_unified_enabled_policies WHERE policy_name = :POLICY_NAME AND entity_type = 'ROLE' UNION ALL SELECT 'NOAUDIT POLICY ' || policy_name || ' BY ' || entity_name || ';' || CHR(10) FROM audit_unified_enabled_policies WHERE policy_name = :POLICY_NAME AND entity_name <> 'ALL USERS' AND entity_type = 'USER'

display.name: AUDIT Statement
display.description: Create the AUDIT POLICY statements for this unified audit policy as it is defined in AUDIT_UNIFIED_ENABLED_POLICIES

query.sql: SELECT 'AUDIT POLICY ' || policy_name || ';' || CHR(10) FROM audit_unified_enabled_policies WHERE policy_name = :POLICY_NAME AND entity_name = 'ALL USERS' AND entity_type = 'USER' UNION ALL SELECT 'AUDIT POLICY ' || policy_name || ' BY USERS WITH GRANTED ROLES ' || entity_name || ';' || CHR(10) FROM audit_unified_enabled_policies WHERE policy_name = :POLICY_NAME AND entity_type = 'ROLE' UNION ALL SELECT 'AUDIT POLICY ' || policy_name || ' BY ' || entity_name || ';' || CHR(10) FROM audit_unified_enabled_policies WHERE policy_name = :POLICY_NAME AND entity_name <> 'ALL USERS' AND entity_type = 'USER'

display.name: CREATE Statement
display.description: Create the CREATE AUDIT POLICY statements for this unified audit policy as it is defined in AUDIT_UNIFIED_ENABLED_POLICIES

query.sql: SELECT "COMMAND" FROM ( SELECT dbms_metadata.get_ddl('AUDIT_POLICY', :POLICY_NAME)||';' AS command FROM dual )

display.name: DROP Statement
display.description: Create the DROP AUDIT POLICY statement for this unified audit policy

query.sql: SELECT 'DROP AUDIT POLICY ' || policy_name || ';' || CHR(10) FROM audit_unified_policies WHERE policy_name = :POLICY_NAME GROUP BY policy_name
SELECT nvl(count(*),0) AS events FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE :POLICY_NAME IS NOT NULL AND unified_audit_policies LIKE '%' || :POLICY_NAME || '%'

display.name: Audit Storage Usage
display.description: Information about the Audit storage usage and configuration.

query.sql: SELECT name, value FROM ( SELECT 1 AS id, 'Sum of audit records' AS name, to_char(COUNT(*)) AS value FROM unified_audit_trail UNION SELECT 2 AS id, 'Sum of audit records for current DBID (' || con_id_to_dbid(sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_ID')) || ')' AS name, to_char(COUNT(*)) AS value FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE dbid = con_id_to_dbid(sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_ID')) UNION SELECT 3 AS id, 'Oldest audit record for current DBID (' || con_id_to_dbid(sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_ID')) || ')' AS name, to_char(MIN(event_timestamp), 'DD.MM.YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS value FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE dbid = con_id_to_dbid(sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_ID')) UNION SELECT 4 AS id, 'Newest audit record for current DBID (' || con_id_to_dbid(sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_ID')) || ')' AS name, to_char(MAX(event_timestamp), 'DD.MM.YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS value FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE dbid = con_id_to_dbid(sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_ID')) UNION SELECT 5 AS id, 'Last archive timestamp for current DBID (' || con_id_to_dbid(sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_ID')) || ')' AS name, to_char(MAX(last_archive_ts), 'DD.MM.YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS value FROM dba_audit_mgmt_last_arch_ts WHERE audit_trail = 'UNIFIED AUDIT TRAIL' UNION SELECT 6 AS id, 'Sum of audit records older than event timestamp for current DBID (' || con_id_to_dbid(sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_ID')) || ')' AS name, to_char(COUNT(u.event_timestamp)) AS value FROM unified_audit_trail u, dba_audit_mgmt_last_arch_ts t WHERE t.audit_trail = 'UNIFIED AUDIT TRAIL' AND u.event_timestamp < t.last_archive_ts UNION SELECT * FROM ( SELECT 7 AS id, 'Sum of audit records for foreign DBID' AS name, to_char(COUNT(*)) AS value FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE dbid <> con_id_to_dbid(sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_ID')) ) WHERE value > 0 UNION SELECT * FROM ( SELECT 8 AS id, 'Oldest audit record for foreign DBID' AS name, to_char(MIN(event_timestamp), 'DD.MM.YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS value FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE dbid <> con_id_to_dbid(sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_ID')) ) WHERE value IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT * FROM ( SELECT 9 AS id, 'Newest audit record for foreign DBID' AS name, to_char(MAX(event_timestamp), 'DD.MM.YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS value FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE dbid <> con_id_to_dbid(sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_ID')) ) WHERE value IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT 10 AS id, 'Tablespace in use' AS name, LISTAGG(tablespace_name, ', ') WITHIN GROUP( ORDER BY tablespace_name ) AS value FROM dba_segments WHERE segment_name = 'AUD$UNIFIED' UNION SELECT 11 AS id, 'Amount of audit trail data partitions' AS name, to_char(COUNT(partition_name)) AS value FROM dba_tab_partitions WHERE table_name = 'AUD$UNIFIED' UNION SELECT 12 AS id, 'Audit Trail data partition interval' AS name, INTERVAL AS value FROM dba_part_tables WHERE owner = 'AUDSYS' AND table_name = 'AUD$UNIFIED' UNION SELECT 13 AS id, 'Audit Trail data partition type' AS name, partitioning_type AS value FROM dba_part_tables WHERE owner = 'AUDSYS' AND table_name = 'AUD$UNIFIED' UNION SELECT 14 AS id, 'Sum of audit trail segments (data, lob, index)' AS name, to_char(dbms_xplan.format_size(SUM(bytes))) AS value FROM dba_segments WHERE owner = 'AUDSYS' UNION SELECT 15 AS id, 'Sum of audit trail segments (data, lob, index) for tablespace ' || tablespace_name AS name, to_char(dbms_xplan.format_size(SUM(bytes))) AS value FROM dba_segments WHERE owner = 'AUDSYS' GROUP BY tablespace_name UNION SELECT 16 AS id, 'Average audit record length (last analyzed ' || to_char(last_analyzed, 'DD.MM.YYYY HH24:MI:SS') || ')' AS name, to_char(avg_row_len) AS value FROM dba_tables WHERE owner = 'AUDSYS' )
SELECT * FROM dba_segments ds WHERE owner = 'AUDSYS' ORDER BY segment_name

SELECT code FROM ( SELECT 1 AS id, '-- Alter unified audit trail partition interval (' || con_id_to_dbid(sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_ID')) || ')' || CHR(10) AS code FROM dual UNION SELECT 2 AS id, 'BEGIN' || CHR(10) || ' dbms_audit_mgmt.alter_partition_interval(' || CHR(10) || ' interval_number => 1,' || CHR(10) || ' interval_frequency => ''DAY'');' || CHR(10) || 'END;' || CHR(10) || '/' || CHR(10) || CHR(10) AS code FROM dual UNION SELECT 3 AS id, '-- Alter unified audit trail tablespace' || CHR(10) AS code FROM dual UNION SELECT 4 AS id, 'BEGIN' || CHR(10) || ' dbms_audit_mgmt.set_audit_trail_location(' || CHR(10) || ' audit_trail_type => dbms_audit_mgmt.audit_trail_unified,' || CHR(10) || ' audit_trail_location_value => ''AUDIT_DATA'');' || CHR(10) || 'END;' || CHR(10) || '/' || CHR(10) || CHR(10) AS code FROM dual UNION SELECT 5 AS id, '-- Load spillover OS audit files in a unified audit trail' || CHR(10) AS code FROM dual UNION SELECT 6 AS id, 'BEGIN' || CHR(10) || ' dbms_audit_mgmt.load_unified_audit_files();' || CHR(10) || 'END;' || CHR(10) || '/' || CHR(10) || CHR(10) AS code FROM dual )

SELECT code FROM ( SELECT 1 AS id, '-- Purge audit trail using last archive timestamp for current DBID (' || con_id_to_dbid(sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_ID')) || ')' || CHR(10) AS code FROM dual UNION SELECT 2 AS id, 'BEGIN' || CHR(10) || ' dbms_audit_mgmt.clean_audit_trail(' || CHR(10) || ' audit_trail_type => dbms_audit_mgmt.audit_trail_unified,' || CHR(10) || ' use_last_arch_timestamp => TRUE);' || CHR(10) || 'END;' || CHR(10) || '/' || CHR(10) || CHR(10) AS code FROM dual UNION SELECT 3 AS id, '-- Purge all audit trail for current DBID (' || con_id_to_dbid(sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_ID')) || ')' || CHR(10) AS code FROM dual UNION SELECT 4 AS id, 'BEGIN' || CHR(10) || ' dbms_audit_mgmt.clean_audit_trail(' || CHR(10) || ' audit_trail_type => dbms_audit_mgmt.audit_trail_unified,' || CHR(10) || ' use_last_arch_timestamp => FALSE);' || CHR(10) || 'END;' || CHR(10) || '/' || CHR(10) || CHR(10) AS code FROM dual UNION SELECT 5 AS id, '-- Purge all audit trail for foreign DBID' || CHR(10) AS code FROM dual UNION SELECT * FROM ( SELECT 6 AS id, 'BEGIN' || CHR(10) || ' dbms_audit_mgmt.clean_audit_trail(' || CHR(10) || ' audit_trail_type => dbms_audit_mgmt.audit_trail_unified,' || CHR(10) || ' use_last_arch_timestamp => FALSE,' || CHR(10) || ' database_id => ' || dbid || ');' || CHR(10) || 'END;' || CHR(10) || '/' || CHR(10) || CHR(10) AS code FROM unified_audit_trail WHERE dbid <> con_id_to_dbid(sys_context('USERENV', 'CON_ID')) GROUP BY dbid ) WHERE code IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT 10 AS id, '-- Set last archive timestamp' || CHR(10) AS code FROM dual UNION SELECT 11 AS id, 'BEGIN' || CHR(10) || ' dbms_audit_mgmt.set_last_archive_timestamp(' || CHR(10) || ' audit_trail_type => dbms_audit_mgmt.audit_trail_unified,' || CHR(10) || ' last_archive_time => to_timestamp(''' || to_char(sysdate - 1 / 12, 'DD.MM.YYYY HH24:MI:SS') || ''',''DD.MM.YYYY HH24:MI:SS''));' || CHR(10) || 'END;' || CHR(10) || '/' || CHR(10) || CHR(10) AS code FROM dual UNION SELECT 12 AS id, '-- Clear last archive timestamp' || CHR(10) AS code FROM dual UNION SELECT 13 AS id, 'BEGIN' || CHR(10) || ' dbms_audit_mgmt.clear_last_archive_timestamp(' || CHR(10) || ' audit_trail_type => dbms_audit_mgmt.audit_trail_unified);' || CHR(10) || 'END;' || CHR(10) || '/' || CHR(10) || CHR(10) AS code FROM dual )
